'''''"Automated Supercomputing Field Generator"''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must defeat the [[Local Legend]] {{Enemy|Arithmetic Enhancer Mek|text=Automated Supercomputing Field Generator — Verified Type Aur001}}.
